displayName.text: The Most Distinguished Naqshbandi Sufi Order in New York/New Jersey

adrFormatAddress: 296 9th Ave, New York, NY 10001-5703, USA

originalText.text: Deep spiritual healing and celebration through the enchanting Naqshbandi Ziker and Sohba. How amazingly lucky and blessed we are to have this gathering in Manhattan, NYC!  SubhanAllah!

text.text: Deep spiritual healing and celebration through the enchanting Naqshbandi Ziker and Sohba. How amazingly lucky and blessed we are to have this gathering in Manhattan, NYC!  SubhanAllah!

originalText.text: Naqshi zikir hadra in a church main hall... It's a very strange experience. Very good biryani!!!

originalText.text: We are blessed to have such a great Sufi Centre right in the heart of manhattan. Every Saturday people from different areas gather around for a beautiful Zikr( meditation) of Allah (God). It just makes your heart at peace. It's a wonderful experience and all the people are so loving and friendly. They are like family to me.

originalText.text: This naqshbandi sufi center in NY is welcoming to all , every Saturday they have exclusive circle of chanting Allah‚Äôs name while meditation and afterwards a free meal to all who join . Going there , always give me energy and peace of heart ‚ù§Ô∏è. Best thing is it is open for all ages , one can go alone and one can go with whole family . Beautiful loving people and blessed gathering üíê
